pkgmetadata.longdescription: Profile Repeatability // Calculates profile repeatability for replicate stress response curves, or similar time-series data. Profile repeatability is an individual repeatability metric that uses the variances at each timepoint, the maximum variance, the number of crossings (lines that cross over each other), and the number of replicates to compute the repeatability score. For more information see Reed et al. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.ygcen.2018.09.015.
